forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun sets over Downtown San Francisco, the city settles into a graceful stillness marked by clear skies and a gentle breeze. The current temperature hovers comfortably around fifty-two degrees, offering a sense of tranquility that bathes the streets in a soft glow. With winds from the west-southwest at a steady twelve miles per hour, one can almost hear the whispers of the breezes playing through the trees. Tomorrow promises a full embrace of the sun, inviting temperatures to reach a delightful sixty-four degrees before settling back into the afternoon's cooler embrace around sixty-two. 

The clarity of the evening hints at the absence of fog, though the tendrils of any marine layer may linger beyond the horizon, watching quietly as moonlight dances on the water. For solace seekers and strollers, the weather is an invitation to wander through the quieter streets, perhaps enjoying a leisurely meal at an outdoor café or savoring the subtle charm of a walk through the city's parks. Dressing in light layers will suffice—enough to keep warm against the evening chill but light enough to welcome the day's warmth tomorrow.
